Articles.Content:
If this thread has already been done than inform me of so.

Speed up the Mk3/Mk2 Cargo bay opening, they open as slow as snails and are boring to watch.

That is all .

Exactly how fast would you want them to open? They seem to move pretty fast to me, considering that there are no obvious motors/jacks that make them do so.

Also: I see you haven't tried going to Eeloo

Edited October 1, 2016 by EpicSpaceTroll139

Use the cargo limiter to automatically open them. 

1. Start with a closed cargo bay.

2. Take the cargo bay limiter and scale it to about 70 or so.

3. Scale said limiter back to 100.

4. If you need to close it, scale the limiter to 0 to automatically close it.

I'm aware of that, but I mean when the 'open' button is pressed that the animation be faster.

Also: I see you haven't tried going to Eeloo

I've been to Jool b4 and that was slow. I crashed it anyway

Wait... you've gone to Jool... a long and tedious trip, but are saying that the Mk3 cargo bay is too slow to open and boring? I am having a hard time understanding your perspective. If anything, I think the current opening speed is too fast given that the real deal can only open one door at a time... and is even slower:
